Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Halter Neck Wired Bralette- Lilac

review.reviewText: The style/design is really pretty. It however does not offer much in terms of support.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Underwired Front Open Bra- Silver Blue

review.reviewText: This colour is great and an absolute must have. The style is both simple and pretty. Fits great and offers better coverage than the other front opening styles in this collection.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Double Layered Wirefree Bra- Maroon

review.reviewText: This colour is flattering for almost all skin tones I think, fits true to size, style is pretty. I would recommend this.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Lightly Padded Pretty Back Bra- Pastel Green

review.reviewText: I love how this bra looks, stylewise and the colour is really quite awesome as well. However I (regrettably) had to return this as the coverage offered isn't much, for those who are bustier - anyone beyond a B cup I wouldn't recommend this.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Underwired Longline Bra- Auburn Red

review.reviewText: Really liked this one, so much so that I picked up another colour in the same style. The fitting is true to size and fits perfectly. Product is exactly as described. You won't regret the purchase!

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Underwired Longline Bra- Blue

review.reviewText: Really liked this one, so much so that I picked up another colour in the same style! The fitting is true to size and fits perfectly. Product is exactly as described.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Double Layered Wirefree Bra- Lilac

review.reviewText: I wanted to like this one, but didn't. First of all, the lilac colour is the only colour in this collection which I felt did not live up to expectation. It in reality has more  a dash of purple in it. The fit was good, but between the mildly off putting colour and the very obvious seam along the centre of the cup, I wouldn't recommend this.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Front Open Wired Bra- Maroon

review.reviewText: I love how this bra looks, both the front are really pretty as shown in the images and the colour is spot on! However I (regrettably) had to return this as the coverage offered isn't much, for those who are bustier - anyone beyond a B cup I wouldn't recommend this.

Reviewed.productName: Zivame Moroccan Lace Padded Wired Bra- Black N Lavender

review.reviewText: I really liked the fit and look of it. Though the colour is more a black and light pink in reality, if that matters. However had to return it as I found the neckline of the bra to be too thick/bulky and knew it would peek through anything I chose to wear.
